sub_title: Documentation Department at Evergreen Shipping Agency (Netherlands) b.v.
summary:
SUMMARY
Studied abroad in London. Bachelor in Economics degree, Department: International Business and Languages. Fluent in English, Cantonese and Dutch. Conversational German and French. International work experience gained at Shell and Logica. Ability to learn quickly, pro-active and a solid team player. Possesses analytical, communication and organisational skills. End User Computing skills: Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook. Capable of adapting to a new environment quickly. Looking for positions in an International and dynamic environment, where no day is the same and where knowledge can be gained through learning on the job.
 ‘There are no problems, only challenges’.

education.grade: Average Score of all below Modules is: 8

profile_positions.title: Documentation Department
Assistant Manager: Customer Service Booking Department

profile_positions.description:
January 2014 - Present: Customer Service Import & Release:
Coordinating a team of 4 members to make sure that the release department is running smoothly.
When needed give advise and guide the team so they can deal with incoming stakeholder requests in a correct way.
- Enter Bill of Ladings in System; make sure that all features of B/Ls are checked and 
  that it is endoressed correctly. 
- Release containers to consignees after all outstanding payments are received;
- When new features are released in system I will send out guidelines to my team to make sure
  they understand the new updates in system.

Scan, Physical Inspection, Inspection Stack:
- Inform customer when their container is selected by Dutch Customs;
- Monitor the Scan, Physical Inspection and Inspection Stack containers closely, when issues
  arise related to the containers, take immediate action by contacting the Dutch customs to get 
  feedback  and report back to customers.

Montitor Import Overdue Containers: 
Make sure that the list of Overdue Containers is as short as possible. Inform customers of their unclaimed & unreturned containers. Issue Demmurage and Detention Invoices. Issue IMA document for long stay containers. Report Overdue Containers to Head Office on monthly base.

August 2012 - December 2013: Customer Service Import:
- Vessel preparation;
- Send arrival notice to customers;
- Pre-invoicing to customers;
- Check Dangerous Cargo containers; make sure that manifest is sent correctly to Dutch Customs;
- Deal with Change of Destination requests, check with all relevant parties to see Change of 
  Destination is possible and make sure to charge all the relevant charges.
- Credit worthy check,  analyse customers payment history, check financial reports and see 
  whether their balance and annual reports meets the requirements to grant them credit allowance. 
  Report the outcome to management in order for them to decide whether to grant them credit
  allowance or not.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager - Customer Service Department - Import & Release

profile_positions.description:
August 2007- Date
Logica Nederland B.V., Rotterdam, the Netherlands
Management Assistant: 
Support 5 managers and a team of approx. 200 consultants.Maintain large accounts Shell, IQN, BP, TAQA Energy, ExxonMobil, Eneco, Joulz, Stedin, T-Mobile, T-Systems, Ziggo and other smaller accounts.
I first began with the responsibility of the Shell account but over the years my account responsibilities increased to managing multiple accounts. I am very motivated and not afraid to go the extra mile, where others stop I will push myself further to deliver an excellent service for my clients, managers and my team. To provide a high quality of service I ensure that my work is accurate and prioritise my workload to meet deadlines. I collect all queries, pinpoint the problems, and implement solutions.

I am highly organised and I demonstrated this at Logica by using my initiative to streamline inefficient processes. This involved reorganising the work that I managed to ensure work going through the department happened as quickly as possible, as well as to a high standard.

General duties:
Maintain and update contract database. Credit Management; reduce overdue invoices and solve all invoicing problems with client and our internal billing department; Event & Travel Organiser.
profile_positions.title: Management Assistant / Project Coordinator
